title: Algebraic form

title: Subtraction
text: Subtract $$x$$ from both sides, and we get $$-8y^3=-x$$.

title: Division
text: Divide $$\frac{-1}{8}$$ from both sides, and we get $$y^3$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{x}{8}$$.

title: Cubic root
text: Extract the cubic root, and we get our final answer $$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{\frac{1}{3}}$$.
speech: Extract the cubic root, and we get our final answer  y is equal to, 1 half x raised to the 1 third power .
